sentences.en: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.cn: 山谷全景

sentences.en: Artists didn't understand perspective in those days.
sentences.cn: 在那个年代艺术家们不懂透视法。

sentences.en: He was clear-sighted enough to keep a sense of perspective.
sentences.cn: 他很有见识，能保持正确的判断力。

sentences.en: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.cn: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

sentences.en: I would like to offer a historical perspective.
sentences.cn: 我想从历史的角度来谈一下。

sentences.en: If you can be a sympathetic listener, it may put your own problems in perspective.
sentences.cn: 如果你能充满同情心地倾听别人的说话，也许就能够正确地认识自己的问题。

sentences.en: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的绘画艺术中打破了科学的直线透视法规律。

sentences.en: It helps to put their personal problems into perspective.
sentences.cn: 这有助于正确看待他们的个人问题。

sentences.en: It's the collision of disparate ideas that alters one's perspective.
sentences.cn: 是迥然不同的观点之间的碰撞改变了人们的看法。

sentences.en: Moreover, courts can supply a generalist perspective that single - mission agencies often lack.
sentences.cn: 此外, 法院还可提供单一职能机关常常缺少的综合观点.

sentences.en: Remember to keep things in perspective.
sentences.cn: 记住要客观看待事物。

sentences.en: She has drawn a good perspective.
sentences.cn: 她画了一幅很好的透视图.

sentences.en: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.cn: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.en: The novel is written from a child’s perspective.
sentences.cn: 这部小说是以一个孩子的视角写的。

sentences.en: The philosophical perspective is ever the human perspective.
sentences.cn: 哲学观点总是人的看法.

sentences.en: There is much that might be said about friendships. They allow us to see ourselves from the perspective of another.
sentences.cn: 关于友谊的说法可能有很多种，这使得我们能从别人的观点里看到我们自己。

sentences.en: Try to see the issue from a different perspective .
sentences.cn: 试以不同的角度看待这件事。

sentences.en: We may get a clear perspective of the people's happy lives.
sentences.cn: 我们知道人民对幸福生活的展望.

sentences.en: You can get a perspective of the whole city from here.
sentences.cn: 从这里你可以看到城市的全景.

sentences.en: You can lose your perspective. You know, get paranoid? Well, that's something I really try and avoid.
sentences.cn: 你会失去自己的判断力。知道吗，就是变得疑神疑鬼？这正是我努力想避免的。
